message: I propose dividing the $1000000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, reflecting the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor, recognizing the inflationary impact on your share but also acknowledging the benefit of ending the game
Considering the inflationary effect, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
